name: impossible-css
description: An experiment for a conference CFP
author: Cristiano Rastelli

scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --no-map --precision 6 scss/bootstrap.scss dist/css/bootstrap.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --no-map --precision 6 scss/bootstrap-grid.scss dist/css/bootstrap-grid.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --no-map --precision 6 scss/bootstrap-reboot.scss dist/css/bootstrap-reboot.css
scripts.css-minify: cleancss --level 1 --output dist/css/bootstrap.min.css dist/css/bootstrap.css && cleancss --level 1 --output dist/css/bootstrap-grid.min.css dist/css/bootstrap-grid.css && cleancss --level 1 --output dist/css/bootstrap-reboot.min.css dist/css/bootstrap-reboot.css
scripts.watch: nodemon --ignore js/ --ignore dist/ -e scss -x "npm run css && npm run css-docs"
